      • accept

        public ConnectionRoutine accept()
        Description copied from interface: PeerConnectionAcceptor
        Makes an attempt to accept a new connection and returns a routine for establishing the connection. Blocks until a new incoming connection is available.
        Specified by:
        accept in interface PeerConnectionAcceptor
        Returns:
        Routine for establishing the connection
